auth.title: Complete Authentication
auth.description: NextAuth v5 with Google, GitHub, email, and credential authentication. Email verification included.

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Enter your account details to continue

register.title: Create an account
register.subtitle: Fill in the following fields to create your account
register.name: Name

verifyRequest.title: Check your email
verifyRequest.message1: A sign in link has been sent to

error.title: Authentication Error
error.message: Something went wrong. Please try again.

unauthorized.title: Access Denied
unauthorized.description: You don't have permission to access this page
unauthorized.message: Please contact the administrator if you think this is an error.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Manage your notifications and stay updated with the latest activities.
notifications.noNotificationsDescription: You're all caught up! New notifications will appear here.
notifications.noMatchingFiltersDescription: Try adjusting your search criteria or clearing some filters.

analytics.title: Notification Analytics
analytics.description: Detailed insights and statistics about your notification activity.

filters.title: Filter Notifications
filters.advancedTip1: Use quotes for exact phrases: "system update"
filters.advancedTip2: Use OR for multiple terms: security OR urgent
filters.advancedTip4: Use type: to filter by type: type:security

preferences.title: Notification Preferences
preferences.subtitle: Customize how and when you receive notifications.

email.title: Email Notifications
email.description: Configure email notification settings and frequency.
email.frequencyDescription: How often you want to receive email notifications
email.typesDescription: Select which types of notifications you want to receive via email

push.title: Push Notification Preferences
push.description: Configure which types of push notifications you want to receive.
push.enableDescription: Allow push notifications for this account
push.typesDescription: Select which types of notifications you want to receive as push notifications
push.browserDescription: Manage your browser's push notification permissions and test functionality.
push.errorSubscribe: Failed to subscribe to push notifications
push.errorUnsubscribe: Failed to unsubscribe from push notifications
push.blocked: Push notifications are blocked. To enable them:
push.blockedStep1: 1. Click the lock icon in your browser's address bar
push.blockedStep3: 3. Refresh the page and try again
push.disabledInfo: Push notifications are disabled in your preferences. Enable them above to manage browser settings.

inApp.title: In-App Notifications
inApp.description: Configure notifications shown within the application.

quietHours.title: Quiet Hours
quietHours.description: Set times when you don't want to receive notifications.
quietHours.format: Time must be in HH:mm format

mentions.label: Mentions
mentions.description: When you are mentioned or tagged

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
